entry.title: Resume
entry.content:
EXPERIENCE

UnitedHealth Group (Optum), Greenville, SC

Technology Development Program Associate, Starting June 2016

Sealed Air Corporation, Charlotte, NC

Information Systems Intern, May 2015 – Aug 2015

  • Represented IS as the main point of contact within a cross-functional team
  • Analyzed software requirements and assessed system capabilities
  • Built mockups to prototype potential new applications
  • Coordinated and led software training for new users
  • Wrote shell scripts to migrate and clean data on system’s servers
  • Developed a cross-platform mobile application

Clemson Computing and Information Technology, Clemson, SC

Intern, Aug 2014 – Dec 2014

  • Developed web and mobile applications to serve Clemson students, faculty, and staff

EDUCATION

Clemson University, Clemson, SC

B.S. Mathematical Sciences (Computer Science Minor), May 2016

Organizations:

  • Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
  • Wall Street South Investment Club
  • Tigers for Tigers

SKILLS, FRAMEWORKS, & LANGUAGES

Programming

  • C / C++
  • Java
  • JavaScript

Application Development

  • Agile / Scrum
  • Usability Engineering
  • Iterative Development
  • Participatory Design

Web Development

  • HTML5
  • CSS / Sass
  • Bootstrap
  • Node.js
  • AngularJS

Scientific Computing

  • Parallel Algorithms
  • Computational Math
  • General Purpose Computation on GPUs
  • OpenCL, OpenGL
  • Matlab

Additional Skills

  • Open Source
  • Web Services / REST
  • Shell Scripting / Bash
  • Linux
  • Git
